primevc.types.Bitmap

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IValueObject
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
This class makes it easy to load images from several sources, e.g. load from an URL, instantiate from an embedded asset, set the BitmapData directly, give it an Bitmap instance or copy the pixels of a given DisplayObject.

Static Methods

inline fromBitmapData(v : BitmapDataType) : Bitmap

inline fromClass(v : AssetClass) : Bitmap

inline fromDisplayObject(v : flash.display.DisplayObject, ?transform : primevc.core.geom.Matrix2D) : Bitmap

inline fromFlashBitmap(v : FlashBitmap) : Bitmap

inline fromString(v : String) : Bitmap

inline fromUrl(v : URI) : Bitmap

Constructor

new(?url : String, ?asset : AssetClass, ?data : BitmapDataType)

Instance Variables

asset(default,null) : AssetClass

Class of the current bitmap (if it's loaded from a class). Used for internal caching of bitmaps.

data(getData,setData) : BitmapDataType

Bitmapdata of the given source

state(default,null) : primevc.core.states.SimpleStateMachine_primevc_types_BitmapStates

url(default,null) : String

URL of the loaded bitmap (if it's loaded from an external image). Used for internal caching of bitmaps.

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

load() : Void

inline loadBitmapData(v : flash.display.BitmapData) : Void

loadClass(?v : AssetClass) : Void

inline loadDisplayObject(v : flash.display.DisplayObject, ?transform : primevc.core.geom.Matrix2D) : Void

inline loadFlashBitmap(v : FlashBitmap) : Void

loadString(?v : String) : Void

LoadString with call setString with the given url and then try to load the url. If there's no parameter given, it will try to load the current 'url' value.

inline loadUrl(v : URI) : Void

inline setClass(v : AssetClass) : Void

inline setString(v : String) : Void

Method will set the given URI as uri that should be loaded next time but holds off with the loading itself. This comes in handy when a bitmap should get loaded at the moment that it's used for the first time.
